QuestData.Title: Go in Service
QuestData.Description:
We cannot waste any more time. We must get an audience with the Archon, before this next attack happens!
We need to find a way to get you to Elysian Hold... and quickly!
Hero's Rest is a place of respite for the aspirants of Bastion. You can see it floating above from across the fields.
Meet me there when you can. I have a plan.
QuestData.RewardText:
The Polemarch? He is the right hand of the Archon!
She truly believes us. We still have a chance!

Objectives.Objective: Take the gateway to Hero's Rest
